## ggmap (1)

```{r, message=F, eval=F}
# Paket laden
library(ggmap)
# Koordinaten für Konstanz
geocode("Konstanz")
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
coord <- geocode("Konstanz")
coord
```


```{r, eval=F, message=F}
# 
revgeocode(location = as.numeric(coord[1,]),
           output = "more")
```
